data.title: → Le Colombier · 4 star hotel in Alsace · Colmar
data.meta_description: Le Colombier Colmar · 4 star hotel in Alsace, in Colmar city center. Between modernity & traditional alsatian design, discover a haven of comfort, in
data.text:
Your perfect start to the day begins here!

At Hotel Le Colombier Colmar, we believe that every day deserves to start on the right foot, especially with a delicious note. That's why we have created our

"Breakfast Signature Organic & Gourmand."

For you, we have carefully selected each dish and every local artisan to offer you organic, wholesome, and delicious products, and above all, the best of Alsace.

You can savor delicious breads, pastries and local specialties, the essential "Confitures du Climont" jams and honey harvested nearby, fresh seasonal fruits, creamy organic yogurts from Laiterie du Climont, our gourmet cereals from organic farming, as well as a multitude of other gourmet pleasures just waiting for you...

Book now and treat yourself to an exceptional breakfast on your next stay.

With a direct booking on our website, we guarantee you the best rate for the selected period. The Hotel Colombier offers you the most attractive price.

In a secure booking made directly on our hotel homepage, we guarantee you that there are no additional fees.

We guarantee the lowest price on the internet with no commission.
